::Killfest::

Killfest shakes his head. "No, you don't see the point. If we capture 
them, then we can have them secured in the brig. After that, we 
simply take one of them out, slaughter them, and send the one outside 
a video of it. I'm sure it'll help persuade him to cooperate."

do
